data.text:
――Katsuragi Ace was training early in the morning today again. 
Pushing herself to the limits while dripping with sweat.

Seeing Katsuragi Ace like that, wanting to tell 
her what I had decided, I walked over to her.

Haa, haa, haa……Kuu, haa…… 
Faster……faster, to get ahead of everyone……!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
……Haa……huh? 
Trainer-san? Haa……mornin', what's up?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Feeling a tightening in my chest, I look straight 
at Katsuragi Ace. And then I take a deep breath――

Ah……Ooh……? What're you saying all of a sudden? 
Um, scouting……for real?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
I tell Katsuragi Ace about what I've 
been feeling these past few days.

I couldn't take my eyes off her as she straight-forwardly 
chased her dream. But more than that, for Katsuragi 
Ace who speaks of her dreams with pride――

choices.text: I want to support you with all I have

data.text:
The Ace of the Uma Musume world. How many obstacles will 
be on that path? For how long will that path continue on?

When I thought about that, it made me want to 
walk that path with her. ――The more difficult 
it was, the more I wanted to be there for her.

……I've been told that my dream is an incredibly long road. That 
it's unreachable, and might as well be in a different world.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
I didn't want to accept it. There was no way I wanted 
to accept that. Of course, even now……I'm giving 
my all to show that it's not 『Another World』.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
But, even with that……after coming to Tracen Academy, 
it's still thought of as 『Unreachable』 for me.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
There are times where that feels like a heavy chain holding 
me down. ……I shook off those feelings and just ran.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
So I wouldn't be caught, serious, with all my strength, until I 
couldn't breathe. No matter how painful, without stopping my feet.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
With everything……to overturn all of it, 
I need to hit it with everything I can muster.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: ……do you have the same resolve that I do?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
――Could it be that she ran so recklessly, 
to burn away everything, including her anxiety?

『That's obvious』『I won't break here』 those words 
were probably also a way to encourage herself too.

choices.text: I want to fulfill your dream

data.text:
Whether it was 『Mine』 or 『Katsuragi Ace's』 dream, 
I believed both of those paths would lead to the same place.

……In that case, how about we test that out? 
Until the next mock race, instruct me.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: And there, we'll see if our dreams are suited for each other!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
――After that, I spent every day instructing Katsuragi Ace. 
From early morning until night, we put everything in to it, 
until we were out of breath.
And finally……the day of the mock race arrived.

Trainer-san, you're really nervous aren't you!? 
I do feel bad for laughing though……haha, you're shaking.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
If you're this nervous about a mock race, then your heart won't 
be able to handle what comes after! ――Oh, looks like it's starting.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Right, I'm heading out! 
Make sure you take a good look, Trainer-san!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
In today's mock race, there would be a lot of Uma Musume with high 
expectations. There's no way I wouldn't be nervous. However……!
Finally, the mock race is starting!
data.name: Announcer

data.text:
I-is this Katsuragi Ace's strategy!? 
She's running away, taking an incredible lead!
data.name: Announcer

data.text: Will she make it to the end like this!?
data.name: Announcer

data.text:
Haa, haa, haa……! 
Make it to the end, they said……!? Haa, of course I will!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Haa, hahahaa……! Trainer-san, are you watching!? 
Your instructions……weren't bad at all!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: There's nobody behind me right……!?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
This is my run…… 
Nobody will be able to catch me!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Destroying all obstacles and common sense…… 
I'll stand in front……of all those that they admire!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: ――The Ace is me!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: Just leave it to me!!!!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
First place is Katsuragi Ace! It's Katsuragi Ace!! 
Pulling so far away from everyone, she comes in fiiiiiirst!!
data.name: Announcer

data.text:
Trainer-san! Did you see that!? How was that!? 
That was the result from following your instructions!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: Hahaa! We showed 'em! Don't you think!?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Katsuragi Ace was laughing impishly. 
Her sweat told the story of just how fierce it was.

choices.text: It's because of Katsuragi Ace's strength……

data.text: Then, that means this is OUR strength.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Which means……with both of our powers combined, 
there isn't a dream we can't fulfill! Ain't that right!?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
……Saying that, she laughed again. 
I guess that means she's accepted me as a trainer.

choices.text: There's no way we can't fulfill them!

data.text: Yeah! You got that right!!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Hey, Trainer-san. I will become the Uma Musume world's Ace, 
without a doubt. ……What's your dream?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: Alright! Once again, looking forward to it!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
We'll show them that no dream is too big for us! 
Let's show all of them!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
